ygData.subject: Re: WEAPONS for my PET
ygData.msgSnippet: You can give a weapon to your pet, but you can not take it back. ┬á :o( I think that pets have the same level of knowledge than a warrior of the same level. So
ygData.messageBody:
You can give a weapon to your pet, but you can not take it back. ∩┐╜ :o(
I think that pets have the same level of knowledge than a warrior of the
same level. So you can give him any weapon you want, but you must know that
it will be lost for you. So if you have a huge amount of hundreds of
platinum, may be you can waste some dwarven battle axes for your pets.∩┐╜ :o)
About dmg, think about your pet as a warrior who maxed his skills. No weapon
-> hand to hand, weapon -> more dmg (but what about the delay ?)
∩┐╜
Taldir, Teir'Dal in Innoruuk.
∩┐╜

∩┐╜
Any info on weapons for your pets would be GREAT! Thanks!
∩┐╜
